about_the_game:
Mysterious abilities, distorted machines, treacherous gods, this is an extraordinary world unknown to ordinary people.
"In order to prevent the city from becoming ruins, I will borrow your room for one night."
Watching this girl in black who forced her way into my home, I hadn't imagined at this point that my daily life was about to end forever.
-----------------------------
BROKEN God Awakening is a Galgame with supernatural abilities in a modern urban background. It has:
More than a dozen main characters with exquisite standing paintings!
More than 300,000 words for a single character line, about 8-10 hours of game content!
Lots of beautiful CG!
Full Chinese voice!
-----------------------------
The current route that can be fully played is the character [Yelong], and the story lines of [Fei] and [Tottos] will be gradually launched in the future.
-----------------------------
All characters appearing in the game are adults, and the characters, stories, places, plots, worlds and other forms of expression involved are all fictitious, and have no connection with any characters or events in reality.

content_descriptors.notes: Exposed clothing, Underwear, Sexy pose,  alcohol abuse, death, no depictions of sexual acts, extreme violence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2DOU 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: BROKEN God Awakening is a Galgame with supernatural abilities in a modern urban background.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
